/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The buildings are adorned with balconies and awnings, adding architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene and casting shadows that add depth to the image.
